biography: According to Rissa, the problem with people is they're lazy. They don't want to get up in the morning and work all day, so you have to give them a reason to do what they should be doing all along. That's why the world has nobles - to motivate the lazy ones to do their jobs.

name: Segwen
biography: Segwen is the only child of a dwarven lord, so she tried to live up to everything that is expected of a daughter as well as a son. She learned to manage an extensive household and even studied the history of dwarven warfare, all to please the father who died in the Reckoning.

name: Sharah
biography: Sharah fell in love with a human wizard once. She lived a happy life with the man, but since she is an immortal genie, she watched her beloved grow old and pass away. Now, this somber genie tries to carry on with nothing left but her memories and a wish that she too had been mortal.

name: Aenain
biography: Aenain is not as strong, quick, or talented as other genies. Even his vision isn't as acute. But he has overcome his imperfections through ceaseless tenacity and a strong desire to prove his worth, both to himself and to the rest of his kind.
history: Since Armageddon's Blade (Homm3, SoD+AB) Genie Elementalist

name: Astral
biography: Some say a mischievous creature lives inside Astral's turban, enhancing the old man's magical powers. Even Astral is unwilling to confirm or deny the rumor, but then some also say that this tricky elder probably started the rumor just to shake things up.
history: Since Restoration of Erathia (Homm3 All Parts) Human Wizard

name: Brendemar
biography: Brendemar was struck with an illness during childhood that left his lungs weak. He grew up smaller than most dwarves and without the endurance to become a warrior, but he still longed for adventure. So, he turned to magic instead and quickly achieved the excitement he craved.

name: Grindan
biography: Like many dwarves, Grindan began his adulthood as a miner. Unfortunately, he wasn't good at it. He tried several careers after that, failing at them all. Just when it looked like he would be a simple laborer all his life, he discovered a talent for magic.
history: Since Armageddon's Blade (Homm3, SoD+AB) Dwarf Elementalist

name: Gurvilin
biography: Gurvilin fought in the Succession Wars and was instrumental in gaining the freedom of his entire village. His career did not end there, however. Soon, Gurvilin set out into other lands, protecting halfling communities from the dangers of a big person's world.

name: Malcom
biography: Malcom's magical talent was discovered at an early age, so he never worked the mines or forges that are such a part of dwarven life. Instead, he practiced his magical skills each day to become the best mage he could, but sadly this has made him an outsider to his own people.
history: Since Restoration of Erathia (Homm3 All Parts) Dwarf Druid

name: Mudgeon
biography: Mudgeon fights the inner desire to create mischief by exercising great control over his daily actions. Before he goes to bed each night, he plans every minute of the next day, and when something doesn't go as predicted, he gets quite upset at whoever is responsible - even if it is his own fault.

name: Olivaster
biography: Olivaster is a small man with a big name, and bigger dreams. Olivaster may not even be his real name. No one knows this mysterious halfling's true origins, only that what motivates his actions is his dream to one day create and run his own guild of magic.

name: Qubar
biography: Qubar has the tendency to fall in love at the drop of a hat. He is an excellent mage, but he spends so much of his time chasing women and making a fool of himself that he receives little respect from his peers - or genies for that matter.

name: Raven
biography: Raven retired early from his position as Royal Sage to enjoy a quiet life as a hermit. Then the Reckoning came. Now homeless and penniless, he has returned to hiring out his swift, logical mind (few can match his brilliance) to the rulers of this new land.

name: Sylas Zanj
biography: Born a common tailor, Sylas woke one morning with the complete memory of his previous life as a powerful mage named Zanj. Now, he believes he has returned at a time when the world needs a protector, and Sylas Zanj is just the man to answer the call.

name: Solymr (Solmyr)
biography: Solymr ibn Wali Barad is legendary among the genies for his strong sense of honor and duty. He believes so strongly in keeping his word that for centuries he served the Immortal King, Gavin Magnus, after a hasty promise. Solymr has seen the distant past and the destruction of an entire world, and he hopes to live long enough to witness the end of time as well.
history:
Since Restoration of Erathia (Homm3 All Parts) Genie Wizard
	Part in: Price of Peace (Original Homm4 Order Campaign). He is the main figure and takes part in 5 maps of that campaign: The Servant, The Rainbow Crystal, Slave of Fear, To Slay an Immortal, The Price of Peace. In those campaigns Solmyr runs from one side to another, and saves the day destroying his master's Gavin Magnus' memory forever.

name: Theodorus
biography: Theodorus is easily one of the best spellcasters around. Some say it is time for him to retire, but his mind is still as calculating as ever. Since the Reckoning, he has stopped teaching other spellcasters and started a new career documenting artifacts and their powers.
history: Since Restoration of Erathia (Homm3 All Parts) Human Wizard

name: Aine
biography: Aine is an ancient genie who enjoys being surrounded by wealth. She wears expensive silks, elaborate jewelry, and rare perfumes. Despite her desire for the finer things in life, Aine also insists on sharing what she can because as she says, "You can't take it with you when you die".
history: Since Restoration of Erathia (Homm3 All Parts) Genie Wizard

name: Brissa
biography: Young by genie standards, Brissa set out for a life of adventure and fun with no particular skills. So, she learned along the way, usually from her mistakes, but even today her actions are often too impetuous.
history: Since Restoration of Erathia (Homm3 All Parts) Genie Elementalist

name: Calyphona
biography: Calyphona came from high society where style and wit are prized above all else. She always dresses perfectly for every situation. She even carries this attention to detail over to her practice of magic. Seldom has Calyphona blown a spell, even during her apprenticeship.

name: Cyra
biography: Cyra originally learned magic to cast a spell on the man she loved, but he turned out to be different from what she expected. She has abandoned silly practices such as concocting love potions, and now seriously pursues her art. Unfortunately, Cyra still has not found someone to love.
history: Since Restoration of Erathia (Homm3 All Parts) Human Wizard

name: Daremyth
biography: New tests of Daremyth's courage are bound to attract her attention. She has been around for a long time and has risked her life in just about every way imaginable. Boredom is her enemy, so she wanders in search of something new to do.
history: Since Restoration of Erathia (Homm3 All Parts) Genie Wizard

name: Grunkie
biography: Grunkie was a wizard's maid until she discovered that she had a talent for spellcasting. She was fired after a nasty incident that left her employer homeless. The details are best left unspoken. Now, after years of study, her magic is crude but still effective.

name: Melody
biography: In no way does Melody's cheerful name fit her manner. She's a serious, abrasive halfling who feels the need to organize everything around her - everything! But these organizational skills have made her a precise and powerful mage.

name: Minasli
biography: Minasli was the type of child who takes things apart to find out how they work. This curiosity carried over into her adulthood. For her, studying magic is a slow process because she is more interested in taking spells apart than learning new ones.

name: Redwara
biography: Redwara was orphaned in her youth and raised by an uncle in a university of magic in Bracada. It was only natural that she would study magic, even though she was a dwarf. Today, she retains the university's values of discipline and diligence, using them to guide her life.

name: Suzieque
biography: Suzieque's happy-go-lucky nature is infectious to the point that she often inspires others to whistle a merry tune. However, she is a stickler for neatness to the point that even she will lose her temper when things are out of place.

name: Tina
biography: Dwarven miners searching for tin chipped this halfling from a shell of solid stone where she had been imprisoned for centuries. No one knows how she got there, not even her, so the dwarves named her Tina. All that remains is to find out who she is and where she came from.

name: Urnaka
biography: Urnaka and her husband used to run a forge, selling their work to the highest bidder. Sadly, her husband perished in the Reckoning. She hasn't stepped foot in a forge since, embarking instead on a new career as an mage.
